about_the_game:
You are playing as a hero who took a vow to protect crystal core against waves of golems. Ultimate goal of each map is to destroy enemy crystal core by building golems while defending your crystal core. Golems are made of 3 components. Body, armor and shield. Each component can be built from different element. There are 5 prime elements that can be further combined into new element. This way it is possible to build more than 27000 unique golems with different properties. In order to defend your crystal core you can built defensive towers or take matter to your hands and slice golems with greatsword.

Gameplay core idea revolves around 5 prime elements that interact with each other. Water destroys fire. Fire destroys metal. Metal destroys wood. Wood destroys earth and earth destroys water. Thus completing cycle of destruction. But before something can be destroyed it must be created first. Water creates wood. Wood creates fire. Fire creates earth. Earth creates metal and metal creates water.

short_description: Golems TD is a tower defence where you can design your own minions and control your hero in 3rd person. Each map consists of 2 teams fighting each other. Sending or destroying golems earns you resources. First team that will manage to push through defence wins.
